obj.1: A broad and robust understanding of computer science and programming.
obj.2: How to scale your web applications.
obj.3: How to keep track of changes made to code, synchronize code between different people, and test changes to code.
obj.4: The various ways an API can be used.
obj.5: How to design and implement web pages and web apps.
obj.6: Familiarity with a number of languages, including C, Python, SQL, JavaScript, CSS and HTML.
